snippet: Some analysts said it was too early to tell whether the increases on Wednesday were a sign that stocks were close to bottoming out.
abstract: Stocks rally day after another drop in global markets, but concerns linger over economic growth.

byline.original: By PETER EAVIS and PAUL MOZUR

lead_paragraph: Some analysts said it was too early to tell whether the increases on Wednesday were a sign that stocks were close to bottoming out.

headline.main: U.S. Stock Markets End Higher Though Global Concerns Linger
headline.print_headline: U.S. Markets Close Higher, Though Concerns About Global Growth Linger
